title: Linux lspci Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the lspci command in Linux, learn its purpose, understand its options and flags, and identify PCI devices on your system with practical examples.

steps.title: Understand the Purpose of lspci Command

verify.name: Verify lspci command output
verify.hint: The lspci command should display information about the host bridge and other PCI devices on the system. Please check the output and ensure that it includes the host bridge details.

steps.title: Explore lspci Command Options and Flags

verify.name: Verify lspci command options
verify.hint: The lspci command with the -v option should display information about the kernel drivers in use for each PCI device. Please check the output and ensure that it includes this information.

steps.title: Identify PCI Devices on the System

verify.name: Verify PCI device identification
verify.hint: The lspci command should display information about the VGA compatible controller on your system. Please check the output and ensure that it includes the VGA controller details.
